name: Planner
description:
Game made for the Geta Game Jam #4 "Chain Reaction"

Plan what cards you'll play and watch that plan unravel and make you win... or lose.

Fight against pre-made AI opponents, draft cards to make a better and better deck, and don't be shy to share decks and combos or balance or new cards ideas! The best ones will be added in future versions as opponents or changes! ^^

As of Game-jam version, there are 33 different cards and 11 different opponents you can encounter.

This game plays only with the mouse.
